change.changenote: Section 1 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 219/2019, effective November 1, 2019.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of the "other approved products insurance" class of insurance, the commission may specify in the business authorization of a particular insurer the types of insurance business the insurer may carry on within that class.

change.changenote: Section 1 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 208/2021, effective August 1, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of the "other approved products insurance" class of insurance, the Authority may specify in the business authorization of a particular insurer the types of insurance business the insurer may carry on within that class.
